| History                 = Adametco, a company that does [[Adamantium]] bonding, was temporarily taken over by the villainous [[Richard Rennsalaer (Earth-616)|Overrider]]. At that time, the company performed the Adamantium coating of [[TESS-One (Earth-616)|TESS-One]], a robot the Overrider had stolen, which he planned to use to further his nefarious plans.{{Citation}}

[[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] and [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]] teamed up to defeat the Overrider and release Adametco from his control.{{Citation}}

Later, the [[Carl Creel (Earth-616)|Absorbing Man]] broke in the Adametco plant, hospitalizing three security guards, to steal a small piece of Adamantium.{{Citation}}

During a Latverian Consulate party, was revealed that [[Colleen Shore (Earth-616)|Colleen Shore]], a manager of Adametco, was a one-time date of [[Marc Spector (Earth-616)|Marc Spector]]{{Citation}}
